403.title: Insufficient permissions
403.text: Apparently, you are unable to perform this action. Contact an administrator.

401.title: Invalid credentials
401.text: To continue, contact an administrator to check your authentication credentials.

500.title: Server connection failed
500.text: Oops! Looks like something went wrong. Wait a few minutes and try again.

400.title: Oops! Something went wrong
400.text: Wait a few minutes and try again.

404.title: Error in resource request
404.text: Sorry, the requested API could not be found. Please try again.

422.title: Data error
422.text: Sorry, the request could not be processed due to invalid data. Please review the information provided and try again.

409.title: User already exists
409.text: The user already exists. Please try again.

429.title: Limit of attempts exceeded
429.text: You have exceeded the limit of attempts. Please try again.

validation.minLength: Must be at least {{count}} characters long
validation.validationPassword: The password must be at least 6 characters long, contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
